synopsis.text: After a mysterious phenomenon turns all of humanity to stone, Taiju Ooki awakens several thousand years later to find the world filled with statues overgrown by nature. He soon discovers his science-loving friend Senku Ishigami has also revived, and the two make it their mission to rebuild civilization using the power of science. Joining forces with their classmate Yuzuriha Ogawa, who Taiju has long harbored feelings for, the trio works to revive other petrified humans. However, conflicting ideologies arise among those revived, threatening Senku's master plan. Even as progress is made, the reason behind the phenomenon that caused mankind's petrification remains a mystery. Depicting the epic journey of rebooting civilization from stone age to modern era, this crafting adventure explores the resilience of human ingenuity and relationships amidst an event that upended the world.
